title: Ticket #2425: param_info_c_generator.pl: explicit default=UNDEFINED
description:
/src/condor_utils/param_info_c_generator.pl currently checks that a default is set for some parameter types, but not all, as UNDEFINED is a valid default in some cases. However, detecting an un-set default is useful; it can catch mistakes.

Proposed: teach param_info_c_generator.pl about a special value of UNDEFINED for a default. If present, the default is treated as blank. If the default is blank (really blank, not UNDEFINED blank), that is a fatal error.
creator: adesmet
